author: rbb
msg: It took me a while, but I found the aprlib.def file, and now Apache builds

author: rbb
msg: Fix process creation on Windows.  We need to pretty much always provide absolute
paths instead of relative paths when we want to specify a new directory.

author: rbb
msg: Fix some build issues with APR on Windows.  I am still getting some warnings,
but at least Apache itself will almost build again.

author: rbb
msg: Fix some warnings when compiling with -Wall
